articles.content: We all used to think there were nine planets. But in 2006 the solar system was left with only eight planets, when Pluto was no longer classified as such. Is it still possible there is a planet out th… [+9177 chars]

articles.author: Natasha Kumar
articles.title: Astronomers have found stars that will soon leave the Milky Way - The Times Hub
articles.description: Spread the love An international team of astronomers has found six stars that are accelerated to such high speeds that they are ready to leave the Milky Way. These runaway stars accelerated after supernova explosions. The observation was made using the ESA Ga…
